com.xerox.xrce.codex.jri.messages
Class JRIMessages

java.lang.Object
  com.xerox.xrce.codex.jri.messages.JRIMessages

public class JRIMessages
extends java.lang.Object

JRIMessages is the class to manage strings to be internationalized Language files are in .properties file (BUNDLE_NAME_ln_cn.properties)
